https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kJ1BXpMJmb5N2Nn2LAAPlPTqKSk.jpg Elmer Fudd attends a musical concert, only to find it's Daffy Duck performing a song about escaping hunters, and Elmer is unable to contain himself, donning his hunting gear and chasing the duck as he finishes his song. Daffy's Rhapsody
